mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_WRITER , BOARD_REGDATE , BOARD_CNT FROM T_BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_FILE_NO , BOARD_FILE_NAME , BOARD_FILE_PATH , BOARD_FILE_ORIGIN , BOARD_FILE_CATE FROM T_BOARD_FILE WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BOARD_FILE( BOARD_NO, BOARD_FILE_NO, BOARD_FILE_NAME, BOARD_FILE_PATH, BOARD_FILE_ORIGIN, BOARD_FILE_CATE ) VALUES ( #{boardNo}, ( SELECT IFNULL(MAX(A.BOARD_FILE_NO), 0) + 1 FROM T_BOARD_FILE A WHERE A.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ), #{boardFileName}, #{boardFilePath}, #{boardFileOrigin}, #{boardFileCate} )
